text.content:
Certain equipment comes with an unique set of qualities, with additional qualities being able to be unlocked in order through access to blacksmiths or artisans at the discretion of the Game Master, when it makes sense in the narrative.

Such items are considered masterworks and are extremely rare. In fact, you may only see one of these once in a campaign!

Qualities

These items always have their initial quality already unlocked. The cost for unlocking them can be seen below:

Quality

Cost

1

Free

2

500z

3

1000z

4

2000z

Upgrades

Based on their type, the following fundamental upgrades are available separately:

Type

Effect

Cost
